articles.author: Matt Lundy
articles.title: Blame America: Why Canada's steep inflation isn't entirely our fault - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: Most of Canada’s ‘excess inflation’ is being driven by U.S. fiscal policy, researchers at the Federal Reserve argue
articles.content:
Shoppers at the Toronto Eaton Centre on July 18.Fred Lum/The Globe and Mail
In analyzing the causes of high inflation in Canada, many experts point to interest rates that were too low for too long, … [+5941 chars]
